answer:
The nurses at ImmunizeBC only provide information about immunization. Please contact your local health unit or HealthLink BC at 8-1-1 for information on bat testing. If there is any chance that you may have been exposed to the rabies virus, contact your local health unit or health care provider right away. 
You can find the contact information for health units in B.C. here. 
Immunization Nurse
question: Where do I get a bat tested for rabies?
